name: Figma
content: A collaborative interface design tool.
content_zh: 一款强大的在线协作界面设计工具。

name: Sketch
content: A powerful vector-based design tool for macOS.
content_zh: macOS 平台强大的矢量设计工具。

name: Canva
content: An easy-to-use online design platform.
content_zh: 一个简单易用的在线设计平台。

name: ProtoPie
content: High-fidelity prototyping tool for complex interactions.
content_zh: 用于复杂交互的高保真原型设计工具。

name: Unsplash
content: The internet’s source of freely-usable images.
content_zh: 互联网上可免费使用的图片来源。

name: Pexels
content: Free stock photos & videos shared by talented creators.
content_zh: 由才华横溢的创作者分享的免费库存照片和视频。

name: Pixabay
content: Stunning royalty-free images & royalty-free stock.
content_zh: 令人惊叹的免版税图片和免版税库存。

name: Dribbble
content: A platform for designers to share their work.
content_zh: 一个供设计师分享作品的平台。

name: Behance
content: A platform to showcase and discover creative work.
content_zh: 一个展示和发现创意作品的平台。

name: VS Code
content: A powerful and popular code editor from Microsoft.
content_zh: 微软出品的强大且流行的代码编辑器。

name: GitHub
content: The world's leading software development platform.
content_zh: 全球领先的软件开发平台。

name: Postman
content: The collaboration platform for API development.
content_zh: API 开发的协作平台。

name: Vue.js
content: The progressive JavaScript framework.
content_zh: 渐进式 JavaScript 框架。

name: CodePen
content: An online community for testing and showcasing user-created HTML, CSS and JavaScript code snippets.
content_zh: 一个用于测试和展示用户创建的 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 代码片段的在线社区。

name: Stack Overflow
content: The largest online community for programmers to learn, share their knowledge, and build their careers.
content_zh: 最大的程序员在线社区，供他们学习、分享知识和建立职业生涯。

name: Juejin
content: A leading developer community in China.
content_zh: 中国领先的开发者社区。

name: Docker
content: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.
content_zh: 一个用于在容器中开发、交付和运行应用程序的平台。

name: React
content: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
content_zh: 一个用于构建用户界面的 JavaScript 库。

name: Node.js
content: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
content_zh: 一个基于 Chrome V8 引擎的 JavaScript 运行时。

name: PostgreSQL
content: The world's most advanced open source relational database.
content_zh: 世界上最先进的开源关系数据库。

name: Jenkins
content: The leading open source automation server.
content_zh: 领先的开源自动化服务器。

name: ChatGPT
content: A conversational AI model by OpenAI.
content_zh: 由 OpenAI 开发的对话式 AI 模型。

name: Midjourney
content: An independent research lab that produces a proprietary artificial intelligence program that creates images from textual descriptions.
content_zh: 一个独立的研究实验室，可根据文本描述创建图像。

name: Perplexity AI
content: An AI-powered search engine.
content_zh: 一个由 AI 驱动的搜索引擎。

name: Wenxin Yiyan
content: A large language model from Baidu.
content_zh: 百度出品的大语言模型。

name: Kimi AI
content: An intelligent assistant from Moonshot AI.
content_zh: 月之暗面公司出品的智能助手。

name: DeepSeek
content: An AI model developed by DeepSeek, specializing in code and reasoning.
content_zh: 由深度求索公司开发的AI模型，擅长代码和推理。

name: Tongyi Qianwen
content: A large language model from Alibaba Cloud.
content_zh: 阿里云出品的大语言模型。

name: Doubao
content: An AI chatbot from ByteDance.
content_zh: 字节跳动出品的AI聊天机器人。

name: Hugging Face
content: The AI community building the future.
content_zh: 共建未来的 AI 社区。

name: Claude
content: A next-generation AI assistant for your tasks, no matter the scale.
content_zh: 一个可以处理任何规模任务的下一代AI助手。

name: Google Gemini
content: A family of multimodal AI models developed by Google.
content_zh: 由谷歌开发的系列多模态AI模型。

name: Stable Diffusion
content: A deep learning, text-to-image model.
content_zh: 一个深度学习的文本到图像模型。

name: GitHub Copilot
content: Your AI pair programmer.
content_zh: 您的AI结对程序员。

name: Notion
content: A versatile tool for notes, tasks, and databases.
content_zh: 集笔记、任务、数据库于一体的多功能工具。

name: Feishu
content: An all-in-one platform for collaboration and management.
content_zh: 一站式企业协作与管理平台。

name: DeepL
content: An AI-powered translation service.
content_zh: 一个由 AI 驱动的翻译服务。

name: Trello
content: A web-based Kanban-style list-making application.
content_zh: 基于看板风格的网页列表制作应用。

name: Excalidraw
content: A virtual collaborative whiteboard tool.
content_zh: 一个虚拟协作白板工具。

name: Coursera
content: Build skills with courses, certificates, and degrees online from world-class universities and companies.
content_zh: 通过世界一流大学和公司的在线课程、证书和学位来培养技能。

name: MDN Web Docs
content: Resources for developers, by developers.
content_zh: 由开发者为开发者提供的资源。

name: freeCodeCamp
content: Learn to code for free. Build projects. Earn certifications.
content_zh: 免费学习编程。构建项目。获得认证。

name: PyTorch
content: An open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment.
content_zh: 一个开源机器学习框架，可加速从研究原型到生产部署的过程。

name: TensorFlow
content: An end-to-end open source platform for machine learning.
content_zh: 一个端到端的开源机器学习平台。

name: fast.ai
content: Making neural nets uncool again. Practical deep learning courses for coders.
content_zh: 让神经网络不再“高不可攀”。为程序员提供的实用深度学习课程。

name: DeepLearning.AI
content: Grow your career or build a new one with AI education from the world's leading experts.
content_zh: 通过世界顶尖专家的AI教育，发展或开创您的新事业。

name: Keras
content: The API for deep learning. An open-source library that simplifies the process of building and training deep learning models.
content_zh: 深度学习的API。一个简化构建和训练深度学习模型过程的开源库。

name: Papers with Code
content: The free and open resource for machine learning papers, code, datasets, methods and evaluation tables.
content_zh: 一个免费开放的机器学习论文、代码、数据集、方法和评估表的资源库。

name: Distill.pub
content: An interactive, visual journal for machine learning research.
content_zh: 一个用于机器学习研究的交互式可视化期刊。

name: Google AI Blog
content: The latest news and research from Google AI.
content_zh: 来自谷歌 AI 的最新消息和研究成果。

name: OpenAI Gym
content: A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms.
content_zh: 一个用于开发和比较强化学习算法的工具包。

name: Spinning Up in Deep RL
content: An educational resource by OpenAI for learning deep reinforcement learning.
content_zh: 由 OpenAI 推出的深度强化学习教育资源。

name: Kaggle
content: The world's largest data science community with powerful tools and resources to help you achieve your data science goals.
content_zh: 全球最大的数据科学社区，提供强大的工具和资源，助您实现数据科学目标。

name: Pandas
content: A fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data analysis and manipulation tool.
content_zh: 一个快速、强大、灵活且易于使用的开源数据分析和操作工具。

name: Scikit-learn
content: Simple and efficient tools for predictive data analysis, accessible to everybody, and reusable in various contexts.
content_zh: 简单高效的预测性数据分析工具，人人可用，并可在各种环境中重复使用。

name: Towards Data Science
content: A Medium publication sharing concepts, ideas, and codes.
content_zh: 一个分享概念、想法和代码的 Medium 出版物。

name: Codecademy
content: An online interactive platform that offers free coding classes in 12 different programming languages.
content_zh: 一个在线互动平台，提供12种不同编程语言的免费编码课程。

name: LeetCode
content: A platform to help you enhance your skills, expand your knowledge and prepare for technical interviews.
content_zh: 一个帮助您提升技能、扩展知识和准备技术面试的平台。

name: edX
content: Access 2000 free online courses from 140 leading institutions worldwide.
content_zh: 获取全球140所顶尖机构的2000门免费在线课程。

name: The Odin Project
content: A full-stack curriculum that's free and open source.
content_zh: 一个免费开源的全栈课程。

name: CSS-Tricks
content: Daily articles about CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and all things related to web design and development.
content_zh: 每日发布关于CSS、HTML、JavaScript以及所有与网页设计和开发相关的文章。

name: imooc
content: A leading Chinese platform for IT skills education.
content_zh: 中国领先的IT技能教育平台。

name: Hacker News
content: A social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship.
content_zh: 一个专注于计算机科学和创业的社交新闻网站。

name: Sina News
content: One of the largest news portals in China.
content_zh: 中国最大的新闻门户网站之一。

name: 36Kr
content: A leading Chinese technology and business media platform.
content_zh: 中国领先的科技和商业媒体平台。

name: East Money
content: A leading financial information and services provider in China.
content_zh: 中国领先的财经信息及服务提供商。

name: Bloomberg
content: The global leader in business and financial information and news.
content_zh: 全球商业、金融信息和新闻资讯的领先提供商。

name: CoinMarketCap
content: The world's most-referenced price-tracking website for cryptoassets.
content_zh: 全球最受引用的加密资产价格跟踪网站。

name: Reddit
content: A network of communities where people can dive into their interests, hobbies and passions.
content_zh: 一个由众多社区组成的网络，人们可以在这里深入了解自己的兴趣、爱好和热情。

name: Zhihu
content: A high-quality Q&A community in China.
content_zh: 中国高质量的问答社区。

name: Telegram
content: A cloud-based instant messaging and voice over IP service.
content_zh: 一个基于云的即时消息和IP语音服务。

name: Amazon
content: The world's largest online retailer.
content_zh: 全球最大的在线零售商。

name: JD.com
content: One of the two massive B2C online retailers in China.
content_zh: 中国两大B2C在线零售商之一。

name: YouTube
content: The world's largest video sharing platform.
content_zh: 全球最大的视频分享平台。

name: Bilibili
content: A popular video sharing and streaming platform in China.
content_zh: 中国流行的视频分享和直播平台。

name: Spotify
content: A digital music, podcast, and video service.
content_zh: 一个数字音乐、播客和视频服务。

name: Meituan
content: China's leading e-commerce platform for services.
content_zh: 中国领先的生活服务电子商务平台。

name: Allrecipes
content: A community-based food website with recipes, cooking tips, and meal ideas.
content_zh: 一个以社区为基础的美食网站，提供食谱、烹饪技巧和膳食创意。

name: IMDb
content: The world's most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV and celebrity content.
content_zh: 全球最受欢迎、最权威的电影、电视和名人内容来源。

name: Vercel
content: A platform for frontend frameworks and static sites.
content_zh: 专为前端框架和静态网站打造的平台。

name: Netlify
content: An all-in-one platform for automating modern web projects.
content_zh: 一个用于自动化现代 Web 项目的一体化平台。

name: Alibaba Cloud
content: A global leader in cloud computing and artificial intelligence.
content_zh: 全球领先的云计算及人工智能科技公司。

name: 7-Zip
content: A free and open-source file archiver.
content_zh: 一款免费开源的文件压缩工具。

name: CCleaner
content: A utility used to clean potentially unwanted files.
content_zh: 用于清理潜在无用文件的实用工具。

name: CPU-Z
content: A freeware that gathers information on some of the main devices of your system.
content_zh: 一款收集系统主要设备信息的免费软件。

name: GPU-Z
content: A lightweight utility designed to give you all information about your video card and GPU.
content_zh: 一款旨在为您提供有关显卡和 GPU 所有信息的轻量级实用程序。

name: Driver Booster
content: A tool that helps you to update all the outdated drivers on your computer.
content_zh: 一款帮助您更新计算机上所有过时驱动程序的工具。

name: PCPartPicker
content: A website that allows you to build a virtual PC and checks for component compatibility.
content_zh: 一个可以让你组建虚拟电脑并检查组件兼容性的网站。

name: ZOL.com.cn
content: A major Chinese tech portal with a PC builder tool.
content_zh: 中国主流的科技门户网站，提供电脑组装模拟器。

name: PConline.com.cn
content: Another major Chinese tech portal with a PC builder tool.
content_zh: 另一个中国主流的科技门户网站，提供DIY装机工具。

name: AIDA64
content: A comprehensive system information, diagnostics, and benchmarking tool.
content_zh: 一款功能强大的系统信息、诊断和基准测试工具。

name: MemTest86
content: The original, free, stand-alone memory testing software for x86 and ARM computers.
content_zh: 用于 x86 和 ARM 计算机的免费、独立的内存测试软件。

name: CrystalDiskInfo
content: A HDD/SSD utility software which supports a part of USB, Intel RAID and NVMe.
content_zh: 一款硬盘/固态硬盘工具软件，支持部分 USB、Intel RAID 和 NVMe。

name: iFixit
content: A wiki-based site that teaches people how to fix almost anything.
content_zh: 一个基于维基的网站，教人们如何修理几乎任何东西。

name: Tuba Toolbox
content: A popular hardware detection toolset in China.
content_zh: 国内流行的硬件检测工具箱。

name: UserBenchmark
content: Speed test your PC in less than a minute.
content_zh: 在不到一分钟的时间内快速测试您的电脑性能。

name: HWiNFO
content: In-depth hardware information, real-time system monitoring, and reporting.
content_zh: 提供深入的硬件信息、实时系统监控和报告。

name: Speccy
content: Fast, lightweight, advanced system information tool for your PC.
content_zh: 适用于您电脑的快速、轻巧、高级的系统信息工具。

name: Keyboard Tester
content: An online tool to test your keyboard.
content_zh: 一个用于在线测试键盘的工具。

name: EIZO Monitor Test
content: A comprehensive online monitor test.
content_zh: 一个全面的在线显示器测试工具。

name: LinkedIn
content: The world's largest professional network.
content_zh: 全球最大的职业社交网站。

name: Glassdoor
content: Find jobs, company reviews, and salary information.
content_zh: 查找工作、公司评论和薪资信息。

name: Zhaopin
content: A leading online recruitment platform in China.
content_zh: 中国领先的在线招聘平台。

name: Boss Zhipin
content: A popular mobile-first job board in China.
content_zh: 中国流行的移动端招聘平台。

name: Booking.com
content: The world leader in booking accommodation online.
content_zh: 全球领先的在线住宿预订网站。

name: Airbnb
content: A community marketplace for unique accommodations and experiences.
content_zh: 一个提供独特住宿和体验的社区市场。

name: Trip.com
content: A leading one-stop travel service provider.
content_zh: 领先的一站式旅行服务提供商。

name: Skyscanner
content: A global search engine for flights, hotels, and car rentals.
content_zh: 一个全球性的航班、酒店和租车搜索引擎。

name: Steam
content: The ultimate destination for playing, discussing, and creating games.
content_zh: 玩、讨论和创作游戏的终极目的地。

name: IGN
content: Your source for games, movies, and tech news and reviews.
content_zh: 您的游戏、电影和科技新闻与评测来源。

name: Twitch
content: The world's leading live streaming platform for gamers.
content_zh: 全球领先的游戏玩家直播平台。

name: NGA
content: A popular Chinese gaming community.
content_zh: 一个流行的中文游戏社区。

name: Gov.cn
content: The official web portal of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.
content_zh: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府官方门户网站。

name: National Health Commission
content: The official website of the National Health Commission of the PRC.
content_zh: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会官方网站。

name: MIIT
content: The official website of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the PRC.
content_zh: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部官方网站。

name: Dev.to
content: A constructive and inclusive social network for software developers.
content_zh: 一个为软件开发者打造的建设性、包容性的社交网络。

name: Smashing Magazine
content: An online magazine for professional web designers and developers.
content_zh: 一本面向专业网页设计师和开发者的在线杂志。

name: Tom's Hardware
content: The latest in computer hardware news, reviews and guides.
content_zh: 最新的计算机硬件新闻、评测和指南。

name: FiveThirtyEight
content: Data-driven news and analysis on politics, sports, science & culture.
content_zh: 关于政治、体育、科学和文化的由数据驱动的新闻和分析。

name: ArXiv
content: A free distribution service and an open-access archive for scholarly articles.
content_zh: 一个免费的学术文章分发服务和开放获取档案库。

name: Two Minute Papers
content: Explaining the latest exciting research papers in a few minutes.
content_zh: 在几分钟内解释最新、最激动人心的研究论文。

name: AnandTech
content: In-depth reviews of computer hardware and technology.
content_zh: 对计算机硬件和技术的深度评测。

name: Google Scholar
content: A simple way to broadly search for scholarly literature.
content_zh: 一个简单的方法来广泛搜索学术文献。

name: DeepMind Blog
content: The official blog from DeepMind, sharing their latest research.
content_zh: 来自 DeepMind 的官方博客，分享他们的最新研究。

name: Martin Fowler's Blog
content: A blog on software design and development by Martin Fowler.
content_zh: 由 Martin Fowler 撰写的关于软件设计和开发的博客。

name: InfoQ
content: Software development and architecture news, articles, and presentations.
content_zh: 关于软件开发和架构的新闻、文章和演讲。

name: Real Python
content: High-quality Python tutorials and learning resources.
content_zh: 高质量的 Python 教程和学习资源。

name: TechCrunch
content: The latest technology news and information on startups.
content_zh: 关于初创公司的最新科技新闻和信息。
